alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 4:39PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Box Butte, southwestern Dawes and central Sioux Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 339 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Agate Bed National Monument, or 34 miles northeast of Torrington, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Agate Bed National Monument and Flahertys Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux
